#new Numi nu flux
beam_type=0

# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = 14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1

beam_energy = 5000 50000 6.78507e-06 4.86896e-06 3.94903e-06 3.34018e-06 2.90956e-06 2.54650e-06 2.28787e-06 2.04961e-06 1.85345e-06 1.69827e-06 1.53642e-06 1.41473e-06 1.28130e-06 1.18419e-06 1.07290e-06 9.88757e-07 9.06115e-07 8.42301e-07 7.60841e-07 6.94909e-07 6.19462e-07 5.78754e-07 5.31736e-07 4.75759e-07 4.40441e-07 4.02552e-07 3.71215e-07 3.40375e-07 3.16818e-07 2.90653e-07 2.66663e-07 2.48852e-07 2.28189e-07 2.11295e-07 1.93518e-07 1.81962e-07 1.68424e-07 1.51371e-07 1.36651e-07 1.23746e-07 1.12641e-07 1.02157e-07 9.78681e-08 9.39489e-08 8.96216e-08 8.63609e-08 8.37130e-08 7.78946e-08 7.54906e-08 7.44790e-08 7.10892e-08 6.84686e-08 6.56285e-08 6.30613e-08 6.03610e-08 5.91554e-08 5.70593e-08 5.46286e-08 5.34604e-08 5.38198e-08 5.23749e-08 5.26842e-08 5.08142e-08 5.09157e-08 5.13228e-08 5.28484e-08 5.19899e-08 5.13883e-08 5.21457e-08 5.28112e-08 5.30977e-08 5.27260e-08 5.08040e-08 4.72128e-08 4.70125e-08 4.45495e-08 4.35043e-08 4.12480e-08 4.03854e-08 3.97383e-08 3.77318e-08 3.72685e-08 3.30514e-08 3.33536e-08 3.31484e-08 3.23664e-08 3.06515e-08 2.99567e-08 2.88373e-08 2.52492e-08
